c74object.name: sp.concatmatch
c74object.digest: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed corpus
c74object.description: Find the nearest match in a pre-analyzed concat corpus.
c74object.discussion: Open the Overview Patch The sp.concatmatch object works in conjunction with sp.concatanalysis~ and sp.concatplayer~ to create real-time audio mosaicing via concatenative synthesis with a pre-analyzed concat corpus. sp.concatmatch handles the nearest-neighbor matching.

inlet.description: Takes incoming buffer~ name to find the nearest entry. Also takes the messages for object control.

outlet.description: The nearest entry in the pre-trained concat corpus.

outlet.digest: Position and name outlet for waveform~
outlet.description: Sends the buffer~ name and playback position to be used with waveform~.

objarg.name: default
objarg.digest: JSON file to load by default
objarg.description: JSON file to load by default.

method.name: info
method.digest: Print summary information about the concat corpus
method.description: Print summary information about the concat corpus.

method.name: load
method.description: Opens file dialog to select pre-trained concat .json file.

method.name: print
method.digest: Print summary info to Max console
method.description: Prints summary info including overall statistics to the Max console.

method.name: rate
method.description: Rate of matching/playback in the concatenation engine (in %).

method.name: read
method.description: Reads a pre-trained concat .json file directly from a relative or absolute path.

attribute.name: neighbors
attribute.digest: The number of neighbors to return
attribute.description: The number of neighbors to return.

attribute.name: radius
attribute.description: The maximum distance (in high dimensional space) that a returned point can be. Any points beyond radius will not be returned (even if they're within the nearest neighbors points). When radius is 0, it is no longer a constraint and the distance of a nearest neighbor is not taken into account.
